dict.acceptation: 帮派，团体；盗贼等的)一帮；（工具，机械等的）一套；〈美俚〉棒球队；
使结成一帮；成群地袭击；

sent.orig: Each gang has its own skills and gang gang map, making each secret society.
sent.trans: 每个帮会都有自己的帮会技能和帮会地图，使得每个帮会都各具特色。

sent.orig: Gang membership and gang-related crime is primarily a juvenile problem.
sent.trans: 帮会和帮派罪行从根本上说是青少年问题。

sent.orig: Zigong salt gang's dish is the backbone of small river gang's dish.
sent.trans: 自贡盐帮菜是川菜小河帮菜系的支柱。

sent.orig: Concrete Qin Huang Dao City Hai Gang District Xi Gang road school location?
sent.trans: 秦皇岛市海港区西港路小学的具体位置？

sent.orig: When the gang discovered his hiding place, he knew he was a marked man.
sent.trans: 当歹徒发现他的藏身之地时，他知道他已成了被监视的对象。
